Meaning: Is this participant classified as TD (typically developing) or ASD? 0 = TD, 1 = ASD
Total score on the Flexibility Scale-Revised. Higher scores indicate lower flexibility/greater rigidity.
Total score on the Behavioral Inflexibility Scale. Higher scores indicate lower flexibility/greater rigidity.
Raw total score on the Social Responsiveness Scale (2nd edition). Higher scores indicate greater severity of autism symptoms. It is called Raw because it can also be converted into a T-score.
Across all trials, average PE for TDNorm profile
Across all trials, average PE across all 3 profiles
Across all trials, slope of PE for TDNorm profile
Across all trials, slope of PE across all 3 profiles
